title: ThanksKilling 2
description: Rumored to be a cursed production and ultimately shelved by the studio, ThanksKilling 2 is finally available. A mega-budgeted, kid-friendly sequel to cult film ThanksKilling and the first movie ever filmed entirely in space.
alt1: woman in astronaut suit floating in space, but her breasts are exposed; floating nearby is a Turkey Crossing road sign
alt2: the turkey speaks with a pumpkin pie with a face and captain hat
alt4: a spaceship that is obviously a little model
